pages.text: Ageless youths serving them
[Serving] with vessels, jugs and a bowl of a pure original drink
They will not have a headache or will get drunk therewit
And [they will also be served] with [a variety of] fruits to choose from
And with meat of any fowl they desire
And [there will be] Houris with beautiful eyes
[The eyes] like pearls hidden in their shells
All this theirs as a reward for what they did
No idle talk will they hear there, nor any sinful speech
All talk being of good and peace
And those people on the Right — how will those people on the Right be
They shall be in the midst of trees [with fruit-bearing branches] bent down
And banana plants growing layers of fruit
And extended shade
And running water
And fruits abundant
Inexhaustive and unforbidden
And they shall be [comfortably seated on] raised couches
We shall indeed have created them [female companions] into a new creation
And so shall have made them afres
Loving and of same age group
For the People on the Right
Many [of them will be] from the earlier peoples
And many from later times
And those People on the Left — how will those People on the Left be
In hot wind and boiling water
And under the shadow of black smoke
Neither cool nor soothing
They had indeed been in luxury before
And they had persisted in the Great Retraction
And they used to say, "Once we are dead and are reduced to dust and bones, shall we then be raised to a new life
And our fore-fathers too
Tell them, "Indeed all — the forefathers as also the later generations
They shall all be brought together on an appointed Day
